conbody.p: Oracle CDC Client originCDC record header attributesOracle CDC Client includes change data capture information in record header attributes. You can use these attributes in the pipeline as needed.
For example, if you want to route records to different destinations based on the operation, you can use the oracle.cdc.operation header attribute in a Stream Selector.

The origin provides the following record header attributes for each record:
oracle.cdc.user
oracle.cdc.operation
oracle.cdc.timestamp
oracle.cdc.table
oracle.cdc.scn

It also includes the following record header attributes for each decimal field in the record:
oracle.cdc.<fieldname>.precision
oracle.cdc.<fieldname>.scale
